snippet: William King, 87, whose sculptures are on display at the Lyceum Gallery in Riverhead through April 6, says exhibitions of his work still give him a thrill.
abstract: Exhibit William King: Inside the Artist's Studio, on view at the Lyceum Gallery in Riverhead, showcases more than 20 of King's metal sculptures and emphasizes the elongated, flattened figures that have become signature works of a long career (Metropolitan/Long Island).
lead_paragraph: William King, 87, whose sculptures are on display at the Lyceum Gallery in Riverhead through April 6, says exhibitions of his work still give him a thrill.

headline.seo: William King’s Sculptures at the Lyceum Gallery in Riverhead
headline.main: Thin Men and Other Signature Works of a Long Career
headline.print_headline: Thin Men and Other Signature Works of a Long Career
